title: Removing a working set immediately causes changes
description: When removing a working set, changes occur immediately.
OB: Upon removing a working set, the selected package view becomes unfiltered, and changes take place instantly.
EB: When removing a working set, we expect that the package view should remain filtered as it was before, and changes should not occur immediately. The working set removal should be a separate action from applying any changes.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a working set with one project and select it, ensuring the package view is filtered. 2. Open the working set dialog again. 3. Create a second working set. 4. Delete the first working set.
